statements: SELECT * FROM luxury_accommodations;
SELECT accommodation_name, location, price FROM luxury_accommodations WHERE accommodation_type = 'Villa';
SELECT accommodation_id, accommodation_name, available_units FROM luxury_accommodations WHERE price < 500;
SELECT * FROM luxury_accommodations ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT accommodation_name, accommodation_type, location FROM luxury_accommodations WHERE available_units > booked_units;
SELECT accommodation_id, accommodation_name, price FROM luxury_accommodations WHERE location = 'Paris';
SELECT * FROM luxury_accommodations WHERE price > 200 AND available_units > 0;
SELECT accommodation_name, booked_units FROM luxury_accommodations WHERE booked_units > available_units;
SELECT accommodation_id, accommodation_name, price, location FROM luxury_accommodations ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT SUM(available_units) AS total_available_units FROM luxury_accommodations WHERE location = 'London';
SELECT * FROM Villas WHERE bedrooms > 4
SELECT name, location, price FROM Villas ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT id, name, location FROM Resorts WHERE rating > 4.5
SELECT * FROM Resorts WHERE available_rooms > 0 ORDER BY total_rooms DESC
SELECT name, location, price FROM Villas WHERE available = TRUE
SELECT id, name, location, price, bedrooms, bathrooms FROM Villas WHERE available = TRUE
SELECT name, price, location FROM Villas WHERE bedrooms >= 3 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM Villas WHERE location = 'Beachfront' AND price <= 2000
SELECT name, location, rating FROM Resorts WHERE total_rooms > 50 AND rating >= 4.5
SELECT id, name, location, price FROM Villas UNION SELECT id, name, location, price FROM Resorts
SELECT * FROM Villas;
SELECT villa_name, location, price FROM Villas WHERE capacity > 5;
SELECT location, villa_name FROM Villas WHERE price < 500;
SELECT * FROM Resorts WHERE rating >= 4.5;
SELECT resort_name, location, price FROM Resorts ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Villas WHERE price > 5000 ORDER BY villa_name DESC, capacity ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT resort_name, location, rating FROM Resorts WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC, location ASC;
SELECT island_name, owner, price FROM PrivateIslands WHERE location = 'Maldives' ORDER BY price ASC, owner DESC;
SELECT resort_name, location, price FROM Resorts WHERE price BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM Villas V INNER JOIN Resorts R ON V.location = R.location WHERE V.price < R.price ORDER BY V.price ASC, R.rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM villas;
SELECT id, name, location, price FROM resorts WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT name, price, bedrooms FROM villas ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM private_islands WHERE available = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE total_price > 1000 ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM villas WHERE price > 5000 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT id, name, location, price FROM resorts WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT id, location, size_acres FROM private_islands WHERE available = TRUE ORDER BY size_acres DESC;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE booking_date = '2022-08-15' AND total_price < 2000 ORDER BY check_in_date ASC;
SELECT id, name, bedrooms, bathrooms FROM villas WHERE price BETWEEN 3000 AND 7000 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM villas;
SELECT name, location, rate FROM resorts;
SELECT id, name, location, rooms, availability FROM islands WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE status = 'confirmed';
SELECT id, amenity_name FROM amenities ORDER BY accommodation_id, id DESC;
SELECT * FROM villas WHERE rate > 1000 ORDER BY location ASC, rooms DESC;
SELECT id, name, location, rooms FROM resorts WHERE rating >= 4.0 ORDER BY name;
SELECT name, size_acres, privacy_level FROM islands WHERE availability = TRUE ORDER BY size_acres DESC;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE booking_date BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-06-01' ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT a.name AS accommodation_name, b.amenity_name FROM amenities AS b JOIN villas AS a ON a.id = b.accommodation_id ORDER BY a.name, b.amenity_name;
